LanguageData.CQCAutoSwitch_desc: Pawns switch to melee sidearms when engaged in melee and using a ranged weapon.
LanguageData.CQCFistSwitch_desc: Pawns switch to melee sidearms when engaged in melee and using their firsts.
LanguageData.CQCTargetOnly_desc: On = Switch if melee attacked by current target \nOff=Switch when melee attacked by anyone
LanguageData.RangedCombatAutoSwitch_desc: Pawns switch to sidearms in ranged combat if they can hit their target better using them.
LanguageData.RangedCombatAutoSwitchMaxWarmup_desc: Maximum weapon warmup percentage to consider switching at.
LanguageData.SingleshotAutoSwitch_desc: Pawns switch to sidearms after firing singleshot weapons.
LanguageData.CQCDrop_desc: When does drawing a sidearm require dropping the primary weapon.
LanguageData.MaxSingleMeleeMass_desc: Maximum carry weight percentage that can be occupied by a single melee sidearm.
LanguageData.MaxTotalMeleeMass_desc: Maximum carry weight percentage that can be occupied by melee sidearms.
LanguageData.MaxSingleRangedMass_desc: Maximum carry weight percentage that can be occupied by a single ranged sidearm.
LanguageData.MaxTotalRangedMass_desc: Maximum carry weight percentage that can be occupied by ranged sidearms.
LanguageData.MaxTotalMass_desc: Maximum carry weight percentage that can be occupied by all sidearms.
LanguageData.SidearmSpawnChance_desc: Chance to add a sidearm when a pawn is generated.
LanguageData.SpeedSelectionBiasMelee_desc: How much will weapon warm up time affect melee weapon selection preference.
LanguageData.SpeedSelectionBiasRanged_desc: How much will weapon warm up time affect ranged weapon selection preference.
